attributes.action: Parliamentary Workings 2b fully overhauled after total loss of confidence in MPs
attributes.additional_details: The democracy of the country is lost, Parliament will not accept the will of the people and what is currently happening sets a president for the future, the country has lost the confidence in MPs and Parliament working,  a speaker full of self-importance  with a slant and bias to what's suits his agenda, 1600 laws quoted,  that shows where parliament is in the 1600s. The Country and World feel we are a laughing stock. A commission be set up to address this broken system to save our democracy.
attributes.background: The Parliamentary system to be fully overhauled after total loss of confidence in MP's to serve the people of the UK,  there workings are not working, the system is Broken.  and the workings over the past weeks and months are proving this. 1600 laws working in 2019, shows we need updating.
